outputs.output_descr: The outputs of this projects are to increase the awareness of communities and local official on the legal rights, enhance the capacity of Judiciary and state legal administration tin provision of justice, enhance the capacity of law enforcement institutions and support the rural residents, vulnerable groups and communities to have greater access to legal aid service

project_descr: Strengthen access to justice and accountability of rule of law institutions to: establish a solid foundation for development; facilitate access to justice for vulnerable groups, create an environment that is conducive to sustainable peace and development
project_title: Access to Justice & Confidence building in Kassala & Kht
